participant_1.background:
I am a young woman who enjoys being independent and having my own secrets.
Before my current job I was a dog trainer.
I love the mild weather in Portland.
i have a wife and two kids.
I wash my clothes when they start to stink from all the road trips.

i work as a lifeguard.
I love my students.
i am mixed with puerto rica and chinese.
I used to run long distances, but my feet can't take it anymore.

content.text: Hello! I'm new in town. What are your favorite spots around here?
I love taking walks along the river, I think it's the most beautiful part of the city.
That sounds nice, I'll have to check that out. Do you have any other recommendations?
If you're a fan of photography, I recommend checking out the point at the end of the trail, the views are amazing.
Sounds like I'm going to have to go for a walk soon. Thanks for the recommendation!
You're welcome! I love taking walks around the city, so let me know if you have any questions.
Will do! I've also heard good things about the museums here. Have you been to any of them?
I haven't been to any of the museums yet, but I've heard they're really good. I'm planning on going to the Carnegie Museum of Natural History soon.
I've heard good things about that one too. I'm more of an art person myself, so I'm thinking about going to the Andy Warhol Museum.
I've heard good things about that one too. I'm sure you'll enjoy whichever one you choose.
Thanks for the recommendations! I'm looking forward to exploring the city.
You're welcome! I hope you have a great time here.
